Where to find clients, how to talk to them and how much to charge for your work!

objectives_summary: Learn the fundations for creating anything in pixel art
Create solid line work and stunning shading

items.title: Photorealistic Digital Painting From Beginner To Advanced.

objectives_summary: Students will be able to paint photorealistic digital images.

items.title: Visual Effects for Games in Unity - Beginner To Intermediate
items.headline: By the end of this course you will have started your own portfolio as a Triple-A Visual Effects artist for Games.
objectives_summary: Learn how to create effects for games with Unity.
Fundamental concepts about Visual Effects.
Creating Textures, Meshes and Shaders for Game VFX.

items.title: Digitally Painting Light and Color: Amateur to Master
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of light and color and take your art to the next level.
objectives_summary: learn how to paint realistic lighting and color schemes.
learn how to paint various lighting conditions.
learn how to understand and interpret real life lighting situations

items.title: Learn Blender 3D Modeling for Unity Video Game Development
items.headline: Learn to Create or Edit Props, Design Levels, Apply Material and Simple Animations using Blender 3D for Unity Developers
objectives_summary: Create your own Unity props with confidence using Blender 3D
Make adjustments to Unity Assets by editing them in Blender
Learn how to make a variety of low-poly models for your video game projects

items.title: Blender 2.8 Game Character Creation
items.headline: Learn to Create Game Characters with Blender 2.8 and Unity
objectives_summary: 3D Modeling in Blender 2.8
UV Mapping
Texturing and Sculpting

items.title: Unreal Engine 4 - Learn to Make a Game Prototype in UE4
items.headline: A complete guide that takes you through every step of building a professional and polished SHMUP game using UE4.
objectives_summary: Gain an understanding of Unreal Engine.
Learn simple - intermediate uses of Blueprints.
Develop an understanding for some preferred game development pipelines.

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Digitally Painting Everything
items.headline: A beginners guide to painting anything you can think of
objectives_summary: Be able to paint dozens of different materials and textures
Be able to paint various lighting situations
Be able to paint various subjects

items.title: Create Game Characters with Blender
items.headline: Use Blender to 3D model, texture, rig, and animate your own game character
objectives_summary: Model and sculpt a game character in Blender
Use Blender's retopology tools
Create UV maps and bake texture maps
